scripts.CucumberSmoke: npx cucumber-js features --require features/step_definitions/step.js --tags "@smoke" --format html:cucumber-report.html --retry 2 && start cucumber-report.html
scripts.CucumberRegression: npx cucumber-js features --require features/step_definitions/step.js --tags "@regression" --format html:cucumber-report.html --retry 0 && start cucumber-report.html
scripts.CucumberAll: npx cucumber-js features --require features/step_definitions/step.js --format html:cucumber-report.html --retry 2 && start cucumber-report.html
scripts.CucumberSingle: npx cucumber-js features/UserManagement.spec.feature --format html:cucumber-report.html && start cucumber-report.html
scripts.singleMock: npx playwright test BundIDRegister.spec.js && start playwright-report/index.html
